column5: My buddy just got his fishing license, and I'm gonna take him out on Thursday for a fish. Anyone know of any decent spots to shore fish from? I'd like to see him hook something. I've only ever fished from boat in the Scug, but never from shore. Any advice? Thanks.
from shore your options are really limited. Either off of 7A with da white bucket brigade, behind the grocery store, or on the tip of scugog island.
Well You are pretty limited, but any boat launches (try and stay out of the way of vehicles) port perry shoreline + pier , Ceserea Pier, causeway (hwy7A port perry), or the tip of the scugog island.

Thanks guys, I had a feeling it would be limited. I'll probably stay away from the white bucket brigade... Not much a fan of watching them keep any and everything. Depending on how well the fishing goes, will check out as many spots as possible.  Cheers, Mike
Is there any good shore fishing in Lindsay?
If you travel to bobcaygeon, there's a few around there. Little bob channel isn't bad, lots of panfish... even saw a muskie pulled out from there.
